Title: Wizards of Waverly Place: The Movie
Actors: Selena Gomez, David Henrie, Jake T. Austin, Jennifer Stone
Plot: When Alex ruins a family vacation by accidentally casting a horrible spell on her loved ones, Max works overtime to keep his parents from separating while Alex and Justin seek out the "Stone of Dreams" in a desperate race to reverse the curse.
Awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 win & 4 nominations.
